00003   Name:         largefe.c
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt

00006   Contents:     Experiment specific readout code (user part) of
00007                 Midas frontend. This example demonstrates the
00008                 implementation of the large fragmented event.

00118    EQUIPMENT equipment[] = {

00120       {"large",                 /* equipment name */
00121        3, 0,                    /* event ID, trigger mask */
00122        "SYSTEM",                /* event buffer */
00123        EQ_PERIODIC | EQ_FRAGMENTED,     /* equipment type */
00124        0,                       /* event source */

00127        RO_ALWAYS,               /* read when running and on transitions */

00144 /********************************************************************\
00145               Callback routines for system transitions
00146 
00147   These routines are called whenever a system transition like start/
00148   stop of a run occurs. The routines are called on the following
00149   occations:
00150 
00151   frontend_init:  When the frontend program is started. This routine
00152                   should initialize the hardware.
00153   
00154   frontend_exit:  When the frontend program is shut down. Can be used
00155                   to releas any locked resources like memory, commu-
00156                   nications ports etc.
00157 
00158   begin_of_run:   When a new run is started. Clear scalers, open
00159                   rungates, etc.
00160 
00161   end_of_run:     Called on a request to stop a run. Can send 
00162                   end-of-run event and close run gates.
00163 
00164   pause_run:      When a run is paused. Should disable trigger events.
00165 
00166   resume_run:     When a run is resumed. Should enable trigger events.
00167 
00168                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           \********************************************************************//*-- Frontend Init -------------------------------------------------*/
00169     INT frontend_init()
00170 {
00171    return SUCCESS;
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*-- Frontend Exit -------------------------------------------------*/
00175 
00176 INT frontend_exit()
00177 {
00178    return SUCCESS;
00179 }

00217 /********************************************************************\
00218   
00219   Readout routines for different events
00220 
00221 \********************************************************************/
00222 
00223 /*-- Trigger event routines ----------------------------------------*/
00224 
00225 INT poll_event(INT source, INT count, BOOL test)
00226 /* Polling routine for events. Returns TRUE if event
00227    is available. If test equals TRUE, don't return. The test
00228    flag is used to time the polling */
00229 {
00230    int i;
00231    DWORD lam;
00232 
00233    for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00234       cam_lam_read(LAM_SOURCE_CRATE(source), &lam);
00235 
00236       if (lam & LAM_SOURCE_STATION(source))
00237          if (!test)
00238             return lam;
00239    }
00240 
00241    return 0;
00242 }
00243 
00244 /*-- Interrupt configuration ---------------------------------------*/
00245 
00246 INT interrupt_configure(INT cmd, INT source, PTYPE adr)
00247 {
00248    switch (cmd) {
00249    case CMD_INTERRUPT_ENABLE:
00250       break;
00251    case CMD_INTERRUPT_DISABLE:
00252       break;
00253    case CMD_INTERRUPT_ATTACH:
00254       break;
00255    case CMD_INTERRUPT_DETACH:
00256       break;
00257    }
00258    return SUCCESS;
00259 }
00260 
00261 
00262 /*-- Large event --------------------------------------------------*/
00263 INT read_large_event(char *pevent, INT off)
00264 {
00265    DWORD *pddata;
00266 
00267    /* init bank structure */
00268    bk_init32(pevent);
00269 
00270    bk_create(pevent, "BIGG", TID_DWORD, &pddata);
00271    memset((char *) pddata, 0x0000, 100);
00272    pddata += 1000000;
00273    memset((char *) pddata - 100, 0xFFFF, 100);
00274    bk_close(pevent, pddata);
00275 
00276    return bk_size(pevent);
00277 }
